Old Algorithm

```{r}
csv = read.csv("testresults1_3_beacons.csv")
only_results = csv[!duplicated(csv[,c("testid")]),]

floor0 = only_results[which(only_results$floor_true == 0),]$error
mean(floor0)

floor2 = only_results[which(only_results$floor_true == 2),]$error
mean(floor0)
```


New Algorithm

```{r}
csv = read.csv("testresults2_3_beacons.csv")
only_results = csv[!duplicated(csv[,c("testid")]),]

cdf = ecdf(only_results$error)
plot(cdf, ylab="Probability", xlab = "error", main="CDF of Error")

cdf(5)
cdf(10)
cdf(15)
cdf(20)
```
